title: Phase 1: Visual Trust
description: Foundation phase with HeroVideo, LaceMatchViewer, Typography, and CEO positioning. Blocks all other phases.

title: Phase 2: Conversion Triggers
description: Testimonials, social proof, FOMO elements, policy language. Depends on Phase 1.

title: Phase 3: Booking Experience
description: Calendar, deposit integration, confirmation system. Depends on Phase 1.

title: Phase 4: Digital Products
description: Workbook PDF, membership tiers, certificate downloads. Depends on Phase 1.

title: Phase 5: Atlanta Local
description: Events calendar, Google Maps, local partnerships. Depends on Phases 1-4.

title: Phase 6: Technical Polish
description: Lighthouse optimization, A/B testing, analytics, focus group feedback. Depends on Phases 1-5.
